comments:
0515

1. Take a CVS managed project and add a file (a.txt).
2. Select the project and select Team -> Synchronize Outgoing Changes
a.txt shows up as a conflict (See bug 16161).
3. If you select a.txt, you will get the following stack trace logged (although 
everything continues to work)

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 5/17/02 6:44 AM
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFile.getRevision
(RemoteFile.java:235)
	at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.sync.CVSCatchupReleaseViewer.updateLabels
(CVSCatchupReleaseViewer.java:385)
	at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.sync.CatchupReleaseViewer.selectionChanged
(CatchupReleaseViewer.java:525)

(Viewer.java:147)

(StructuredViewer.java:1064)

(StructuredViewer.java:510)
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.AbstractTreeViewer$1.widgetSelected
(AbstractTreeViewer.java:624)

(TypedListener.java:85)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.notifyListeners(Widget.java:637)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runDeferredEvents(Display.java:1432)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:1221)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runEventLoop(Workbench.java:1120)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.run(Workbench.java:1103)

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 15951 ***
